content.question: Which of the following is an argument in the second paragraph of the inscription regarding King Adityawarman?

choices.label: His spiritual attributes and worldly achievements made him a powerful and legitimate ruler.
His attention to the welfare of all of his subjects made him a caring and legitimate ruler.
His conquest of all of the surrounding kingdoms in Indonesia made him a legitimate ruler.
His knowledge of science and ships in an island kingdom made him an effective and legitimate ruler.

content.answer: His spiritual attributes and worldly achievements made him a powerful and legitimate ruler.
